instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message:
Hey guys, 

i'm working on this board and i need your's bet to repair this board! This board comes with the <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> resoldered problem!! ok i resoldered the component but i do a fuking mistake!! i don't double check the component after resoldered and the pin 17 + 18 I left them together !! :mad::mad: i test the machine with this pins together and after this the board don't work well.. fan's spin but don't show image.. 

my question in your's opinion what component i fuck?? <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> ??

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message:
Pufff, you've injected 12.5V on pin18 of <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> and to <CHIP>U5310</CHIP> too (pin 3).
<CHIP>U5310</CHIP> should be fried now, as is powered from 3.3V only.
Change both chips.
You have luck if SMC is still Ok.

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message: Might want to change <CAPACITOR>C8913</CAPACITOR> too out of caution, it's only 6V3 rated, seeing 12V+ might have upset it.

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message: Thank Paul and 2informaticos!! <CHIP>U5310</CHIP> don't have stuff!! ...<CHIP>U8900</CHIP> problem.. Replaced and the machine work's well!! thank you

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message: Not solved yet!! :mad:, same problem before ressolded the <CHIP>U8900</CHIP>!! The machines turn's on but after 4-5 min fans go maximum speed then shut down!! what could be??

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message: i will run asd test! and post the results!

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message:
<CHIP>U5310</CHIP> doesn't appear as NO STUFF on schematic.
The surrounded components not solder too, or <CHIP>U5310</CHIP> was ripped off?
It is the GPU current sensor; a good reason for SMC sensor error...

threads.title: 820 3332, run without image!
threads.message: Ya <CHIP>U5310</CHIP> don't appear!! Problem solved!! 1rst i tested with external HD and I noticed that the machine worked well!!! only when i enter in the client SSD, shut down the machine PRAM reset and Problem solved!! thank you one more time!! Posted can be closed
